title.jp: Love & Eros for All / Nightmare Before Carnaval

synopsis:
A bookstore's job is of course to sell books. In Denki-gai (Electric Town), the place where people who are true to their desires gather, even Ero-Hon (porn books) are valued goods! 
Here at Umanohone (Horse Bone), that sells everything from masterpieces to fanzines, a Ero-Hon lover comes in at full speed to check what's on saleâ€”wait, no! It's actually an officer from the body that regulates naughty books - alias Ero-Hon G-men - creeping in!

Love & Eros for All!
There is nobody on Earth who doesn't need porn!!

title.jp: Deep Deep Night / Is the Denki-gai Pumped?

synopsis:
There are many weird events in Denki-gai (Electric Town). The King of them all is the Great Late Summer Greetings Contest! Umanohone's folks are burning with a desire to put their hands on the cash prize.
Move it, you people! Who are you doing "meow meow" with, slut? And you, stop complaining about not having anyone to do "meow meow" with! You already got a 2D wife, cut it out!
Here is the swimsuit episode already! Let's make our Cosmo-like something burn for the prize!

title.jp: Party Hard / Hio-tan, Go Home / Endless Carnival

synopsis:
Is it the Christmas Party episode? No! The Cosplay episode! Miniskirt Santa, a dream come true! And rather peculiar costumes are on demand, too! But Umanohone's selling moe-style games! The sequel to the very popular one that come out a year ago. Customers get stars in their eyes reuniting with their lover after one year. We can say this is pure love! It's the safe for all ages version!
Even Hio-tan is crying. Merry Merry Christmas everyone!

Valentine's Day! Also known as the final test for girly-power (level of ability and motivation in fashion, makeup, homemaking, all sorts of femininity markers)! There's no girl in Umanohone who is not girly-powered enough to participate! ...Right? All Umanohone ladies are getting either dreamy, nervous or rather depressed in the wake of the biggest event of the year. Our girls in love's girly-power gauges are set on maximum! Enchant us with your super-knockdown blushing face combo!

title.jp: Panties in the Spring / I am Rain / Rustling

synopsis:
There's no man on Earth who doesn't like panties! (Wise saying.) Of course Umio loves panties, too! (Let's make it clear.) Sensei tells him bashfully, "Do you want to see them?" What's going on between those two?! Then she shows up! A mysterious woman who knows about Umanohone's past. And she's got unsurpassable girly-power! To top it all, her amazing power is still rising...?
Tsk! Our scouter (yes, the device to measure power in that famous anime!) must be malfunctioning!

title.jp: Temporary Manga Studio Umanohone / Secret Paradise

synopsis: Sensei hasn't changed her trademark tracksuit in days... that's because she's been sleeping at Umanohone in order to draw a manga for the Rookie of the Year award! She's doing the "same clothes every day" thing, very unbecoming for a girl! To help her overcome the greatest "death march" of her life, Umanohone staff go all out to support her! And since Sensei's girly-power is awfully low, Tsumorin's big girly-power-boosting strategy starts!

title.jp: To the Bath House... / A Full Chest

synopsis: Summer Comiket, an  event so hot that you can see clouds forming inside the venue! So here's the onsen (Japanese hot springs) episode! When you have to sweat, you need an onsen. Umanohone supports Oedo Onsen Monogatari! Then... we don't know if it was summer's fault, or the yukata (light kimono) or what, but Kantoko x Hio-tan x Tsumorin x Kameko's intricate love tangle starts unfolding. Wait a minute - three girls for one guy?! Real-life achievers must die!!

First date... Aaaargh!!! No, please! Sensei's life gauge is down to zero! She accidentally set up a date with Umio (it was really an accident) and now she doesn't even know what to wear! I should go for the rough look, then! Her mind goes astray, and she's not even checking her sanity points! As this bittersweet incident is consuming her mind, here comes a helping hand from...? Do you want "rough"? If you want it, I'll give it to you!

Hio-tan caught a cold?! She's off work and Kantoku, worried, shows up to take care of her.

He comes in her apartment and even cooks her some rice soup - Hio-tan is flustered by this kind Kantoku, completely different than his usual self. But those love comedy waves quickly disappear when she suddenly gets dizzy and collapses! To help her, Kantoku kicks a door down and carries her out, running in the street at night. Her heart is touched by his behavior....

Valentine's Day! I've got the impression I already shouted the same thing in episode four--Valentine's Day! 

Sensei ventures in a super-difficult mission that no amateur should ever dare trying - not even if it's a revenge  match: homemade chocolate! But of course she can't cope and collapses. She was too reckless...

In times like this there's one person to call: Tsumorin! Get me Tsumorin! Here we go, Tsumorin's Valentine's Day homemade sweets class starts!
Childhood memories. They're beautiful, fleeting, sour and eternal. Even if they're about ero-books! Who would have thought we'd have an episode about G-men's childhood?
The cherry blossoms are blooming, so we're going on a picnic. The wind blows through flowers and hearts alike... and it's a cosplay cherry blossom picnic!!
